case.title: Seeking bicycle riding partner and friendship - 37 (Brooklyn )
case.text: I'm seeking a nice attractive woman to go bike riding with as well as building a friendship that can possibly lead to more, lets ride near the Verrazano bridge together and have lunch at the Pier in Bay Ridge, we can even go fishing! Im 37 y.o., , kind, respectful, good company, funny, down to earth. talk and exchange pics first. The weather is only going to get better!
